bugfix: Use SurfaceView instead of GLSurfaceView.

We are not using the unique features of GLSurfaceView right now, so it
doesn't make sense to extend from this more specific class.  More
importantly, some Android versions are not robust to the improper way
way we are using GLSurfaceView.  For Android 4.0.4 (and only that
version) you get a null pointer exception.  We can assign dummy objects
to workaround that bug, but why bother?  So we just revert back to
extending from SurfaceView.

The crash reports related to misuse of GLSurfaceView are linked below.
Note that these are the highest-occurring unresolved bugs to date:
https://www.bugsense.com/dashboard/project/ad73db70#error/96890002
https://www.bugsense.com/dashboard/project/ad73db70#error/102142777
https://www.bugsense.com/dashboard/project/ad73db70#error/101188558

Fix emulation stop when going into sleep mode

The emulation is still stoping on phone calls and home button pressed,
but i think that's a good start.

bugfix: Emulator no longer reloads stale autosave after manual sleep.

Thanks @Gillou68310 for discovering this one and solving it in the
previous commit.  This commit just reverts some unnecessary changes and
adds some documentation.

When Mupen is in the foreground and the device is put to sleep, the
core is shutdown before onPause() is called.  This prevented Mupen
from auto-saving.  When the device was woken, a stale auto-save file
was loaded, thus losing all the user's progress.  The previous commit
fixed that bug.

Emulator lifecycle management is more consolidated to CoreInterface
now.  Less coupling between the classes.

front: Simplified some mechanics in CoreInterface and cleaned up a bit.

Audio thread is killed after emulator shuts down.
Audio thread is killed before a new audio thread is started, in case
the last thread wasn't killed properly.

Changed some variable/method names for more consistency/clarity.

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/littleguy/experimental'

front: Bumped minSDK from 4 to 5.

SDK 5 needed for GLES 2.0.  minSDK=4 had been used in the manifest in
the hopes that a GLES 1.1 compatible video plugin would be implemented.
If that day ever comes, we can bump the value back down to 4.

More discussion on the topic here:
http://www.paulscode.com/forum/index.php?topic=931.0

doc: Sort changelog in descending order of user interest (my guess).

Also tweaked the last entry.  Not sure how technical we need to get on
these changelogs.  I imagine the primary purpose of the log is to alert
users to the changes that affect them the most.  Make them aware that
a game they've given up on and have stopped thinking about is suddenly
playable.  Wake them from their slumber, that sort of thing.

If I'm mistaken about the last item's impact on user experience, by all
means please revise what I wrote.

jni/front: Consolidated C-Java bridging functions back to one class.

Essentially all I've done is renamed the original NativeMethods to
CoreInterfaceNative and made it extend from CoreInterface to eliminate
some wrappers. Basically I just coded in a big circle. At least the
name CoreInterfaceNative now clarifies the relationship between the two
classes.

[gles2n64] : Change halt and busy flags for the RSP into booleans like they should be (no more typedef'd crap).
Also moved some loop variables into their proper scope.

[gles2n64] Change the DepthBuffer struct's cleared variable to be a boolean (since that is literally all it's used for).
Also changed the TribufferOpt defines in gSP.cpp a little to prevent assigning to the same variable twice (since it's unnecessary)
[gles2n64] Changed over more variables' types to proper booleans in the essential parts of the gles2n64 plugin.

[gles2n64] Finally finish the 'booleanizing' of variables to an extent.
Also remove the typedefs for TRUE and FALSE; they aren't needed anymore.
We standardized now, baby.

[gles2n64] Move SDL_Surface hScreen out of the GLInfo struct and into the OGL_SDL_Start() method. Gets rid of a TODO.
Also turn two ints in the GLInfo struct into booleans. (They were being used like booleans anyway).
Also minor styling.
